#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<limits.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int vertex;
int par[1024];
vector< pair< double, pair<int,int> > > pr;

int find(int i)
{
    if(par[i]!=i)
        par[i]=find(par[i]);
    return par[i];
}

int main()
{
    int test,a,b;
    int i,j;
    double perc,min_perc;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
       pr.clear();
       min_perc=INT_MAX;
       cin>>vertex;
       while(1)
       {
           cin>>a>>b>>perc;
           if(a==-1)
           {
               break;
           }
           pr.push_back(make_pair(perc,make_pair(a,b)));
       }
       for(i=0;i<=vertex+1;i++)
       {
           par[i]=i;
       }
       sort(pr.rbegin(),pr.rend());
       for(i=0;i<pr.size();i++)
       {
           if(find(1)==find(vertex))
               break;

           int u=find(pr[i].second.first);
           int v=find(pr[i].second.second);
           min_perc=pr[i].first;
           if(u!=v)
           {
               par[u]=v;
           }


       }
       cout<<fixed;
       cout<<setprecision(6)<<min_perc<<"\n";

    }
}
